component.name: RunManager
component.selected: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor

task.summary: Default task
Fixed enemy switching target
Fixed up enemy AI chase routine (hopefuly)
Delay on target check breaks things
Extracted fov check to its own method
Added same tag damage check (disables friendly fire) Added coroutine tracking in Enemy AI (might help avoid overflow ?)
Still working on coroutines. Sometimes there's an overflow, but normal run stacktrace seems fine (only a single coroutine running at a time ? )
Added limit to number of summons. Changed enemies to only switch layer on death so there's no accidental on trigger effects
Added difficulty handler in options
Target search sorts by distance and returns closest for enemy AI (experimental)
Added remove body coroutine for minions
Added friendly fire check (compare root tag)
Added checking for dead bodies not to take more damage
Disabling collider on minion bodies to prevent resummoning
Added difficulty scaling to spawn limit, time and enemy attributes
Barebones for enemy alerting in. Some issues with index out of range Overflow even more common - need to try a fix
Moved updating position to its own method in Enemy AI
Simplified canSee and canHear
Simplified minion AI find target
Specified alert to be only used by enemies. Simplified some collision and enemy checking in summon AI
Added check for no sound on audio player

Added body remove to destructibles (still need to 'animate' that) Added properly for reset of targetting destructibles on minions Added .5 stopping distance for destructibles : enemy follow in unity depending on what's being targetted
Added chance (0-100) for alert to happen and exposed in editor Changed targetting destructibles to only seek destination once (AI was getting confused repeating raycasts)
Changed targetting destructibles to point at center of destructible (in case of smaller ones)
Player RB based movement - rotation doesn't work (help)
Added character control based control scheme - no physics is bad for doors + jitter (should use rb based, but rotation...)
Merged rb controls into playerController
Cleaned up character controller slightly
Added lives hud Added zombie count hud
Added exp bar to HUD
Added scaling to HUD
Added inventory (skeleton) Added artifact model Added treasure chest with animation Added list of artifacts to player

Added constructor for artifacts Added example artifact list Exposed all artifacts through player attributes (for debug only) Chests add items from the global artifact list if there are any to be gotten
Added game manager to hold inventory Set up methods to use inventory items (need to be revised) Set up skeleton for artifact creation (will try https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aPXvoWVabPY)
Removed unnecessary using directives
Changed summon raycheck to use masks
Limited hudUpdate to only work when enough containers are in the display (avoid out of index on lives)
Consolidated recallMinion into summonMinion Moved summon limit stat to player attributes script
Moved follow and advance into update block Moved findTarget into a coroutine
Moved chase into update block Working on attack - probably need to be a coroutine (wait for animation)
Changed attack to a coroutine
Extracted stopping distance check to its own method
Added check for null targets in attack routine
Added check for null targets in attack routine (fix)
WIP updatePosition (pulling my hair)
Finished moving coroutines into update block Fixed random waypoint generating/navigating Fixed animation double playing Fixed animation not locking nav agent
Fixed summon agent not locking in animation Fixed summon ai getting wrong distance towards destructibles
Changed minion AI to use closestPointOnBounds instead of raycast hit point Added FOV blocking wall inside the destructible wall
Updated minion AI to look for enemies and destructibles separately Updated recall to lock enemy into following until they reach player
Fixed calling update position on disabled navmesh agents

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
